biotools.summary: Toolkit for comparing differential gene expression profiles through gene set enrichment analysis. Starting from normalized microarray or RNA-seq gene expression values the package performs differential expression analysis. Supplying a simple list of gene identifiers, global differential expression profiles or data from complete experiments as input, users can use a unified set of well-known gene set enrichment analysis methods to retrieve experiments with similar changes in gene expression.
